title: Login page appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the login page
AND user is not signing up to Draft Prospects for the first time
custom_expected:
THEN page has 2 columns
AND the right column is an image of a Draft Picks podium
AND the image is proportionate (not stretched or squeezed)
AND the left column has 7 stacked elements: header, username field, password field, Hide, login button, Forgot Password, Questions
AND the header is bold-faced and reads: MLB Draft Prospect Link
AND the username field is a gray line
AND the username field has a prompt: Username
AND the password field is a gray line
AND the password field has a prompt: Password
AND the Hide element has a bisected eye icon and an all-caps label: Hide
AND the login button is a blue lozenge with rounded corners
AND the button has a white, bold-faced label: Log in
AND the Forgot Password element reads: Forgot Password? Send reset email
AND "Send reset email" is blue
AND the Questions element reads: Questions? draftprospectlink@mlb.com
AND the email address is blue
AND the header, 2 fields, and 2 prompts are left aligned
AND the hide icon is right aligned
AND the button, Forgot Password, and Questions elements are horizontally centered

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19560)

title: Prospect Login: no signup link
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is a Prospect
custom_steps: WHEN user loads the login page
custom_expected: THEN there is no signup link on the login page.

title: Select username field - appearance
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the login page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps in the username field
custom_expected:
THEN the field prompt disappears
AND the cursor appears where the field prompt used to be
AND above the cursor is a gray, all-caps label: User name

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19563)

title: Select password field - appearance
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the login page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps in the password field
custom_expected:
THEN the field prompt disappears
AND the cursor appears where the field prompt used to be
AND above the cursor is a gray, all-caps label: Password.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19563)

title: Blank field(s) stops login
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the login page
custom_steps:
WHEN user leaves the username field blank
OR user leaves the password field blank
OR user leaves both fields blank
AND user clicks or taps the login button
custom_expected:
THEN the login button is disabled
AND the cursor moves to the uppermost blank field
AND blank field label(s) and line(s) turn dark red.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19562)

title: INCOMPLETE Incorrect data produce error msg
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the login page
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters an incorrect username
OR user enters an incorrect password
OR user enters incorrect data for both fields
AND user clicks or taps the login button
custom_expected:
THEN the login button is disabled
AND incorrect entries disappear
AND cursor moves to the uppermost incorrect field
AND field label(s) and line(s) turn dark red.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19564)

title: Hide icon changes
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the login page
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks or taps on the Hide icon
OR user clicks or taps on the Hide label
custom_expected:
THEN the eye/bisected eye icon changes to its opposite
AND the Hide/Unhide label changes to its opposite.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19561)

title: Password visible
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the login page
AND Hide icon is a bisected eye
AND label reads: Hide
custom_steps: WHEN user types in the password field
custom_expected:
THEN typed characters are visible.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19561)

title: INCOMPLETE Password hidden
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the login page
AND Hide icon is an eye
AND label reads: Unhide
custom_steps: WHEN user types in the password field
custom_expected:
THEN typed characters appear as ... LARGE DOTS?

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19561)

title: Login succeeds
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the login page
custom_steps:
WHEN user completes username and password fields with correct information
AND user clicks or taps the login button
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the first page of the site.

title: INCOMPLETE Forgot Password link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the login page
AND Forgot Password element has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on "Send reset email"
custom_expected:
THEN login screen disappears
AND enter email screen appears.

title: Questions email link
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the login page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the draftprospectlink@mlb.com link
custom_expected:
THEN 2 new windows open
AND the new window in the back has the user's linked email program inbox
AND the new window in the front has a draft email
AND the To: field in the draft email displays draftprospectlink@mlb.com
AND the cursor is flashing in the Subject: field.

title: Forgot Password process overview
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the login page
AND a Forgot Password option is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the Forgot Password option
custom_expected:
THEN the Forgot Password process is:
redirect to page with email field
enter email address
receive email with link to reset password
click link
redirect to page with security question
answer security question correctly
redirect to new password page
enter new password twice
redirect to site landing page

title: Password Reset email is sent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user was on the login page
AND user initiated the Forgot Password process
custom_steps: WHEN user submits an email address that matches the database or OKTA
custom_expected:
THEN user receives a Password Reset email
AND email has 10 elements: DP logo, header, salutation, body, button, rule 1, body 2, rule 2, "Sent from," MLB logo
AND the header reads: Your password reset request
AND salutation reads: Dear [user's first name],
AND body text matches what is displayed in the image below
AND the button is a blue lozenge with rounded corners
AND the button has a white bold-faced label: Reset Your Password
AND rule 1 is gray
AND the rule's end points are left- and right-aligned with the button
AND body 2 text matches what is displayed in the image below
AND "contact us" in the last paragraph is underlined
AND rule 2 is a darker gray than rule 1
AND rule 2 is the same length as rule 1
AND "sent from" is gray and reads: Sent from MLB Draft Prospect Link
AND the MLB logo is small.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19565)

title: UPDATE Password Reset email - click link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has initiated the Forgot Password process
AND user has received a Password Reset email
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Reset Your Password button
custom_expected:
THEN a new tab opens
AND the Draft Prospect secret question page loads
AND the page displays a white box answer field
AND the answer field has a prompt: Your answer...

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19566)

title: UPDATE Password Reset email - click Contact Us
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has initiated the Forgot Password process
AND user has received a Password Reset email
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the "contact us" link
custom_expected:
THEN 2 new windows open
AND the new window in the back has the user's linked email program inbox
AND the new window in the front has a draft email
AND the To: field in the draft email contains [email address]
AND the cursor is flashing in the Subject: field.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19567)

title: INCOMPLETE Password Reset email expires
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has initiated the Forgot Password process
AND user received the Password Reset email
AND user does not select the link in the email
custom_steps: WHEN 24 hours pass
custom_expected:
THEN the link in the email is disabled.
ERROR PAGE?

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19568)

title: UPDATE Forgot Password - enter correct secret answer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Forgot Password secret question page

Test with username: 
secret answer:
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters the correct secret answer
AND user submits
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects within the same tab to the change password page
AND description ...

title: UPDATE Forgot Password - enter incorrect secret answer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Forgot Password secret question page

Test with username: 
secret answer:
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters an incorrect secret answer
AND user submits
custom_expected:
THEN an error modal displays a message
AND the message reads: [Invalid answer.
Click HERE to return to the login page]

AND WHEN user clicks or taps on HERE
THEN page redirects within the tab to the login page.

title: UPDATE Forgot Password - change password error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on the Forgot Password change password page

Test with username: 
secret answer:
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters a new password
AND user enters a word that doesn't match in the second field
custom_expected:
THEN an error popup appears
AND the popup reads: Password doesn't match.
AND the popup has a Close link

AND WHEN user clicks or taps on the Close link
THEN the popup disappears
AND the user can type in the password fields.

title: UPDATE Forgot Password - change password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on the Forgot Password change password page

Test with username: 
secret answer:
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters a new password
AND user enters the same password in the second field
custom_expected:
THEN the confirmation message appears
AND the message reads:
Your password has been reset, please click HERE to login with your new password.

AND WHEN user clicks or taps on HERE
THEN login page appears.

title: Forgot Password - login with new password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has reset their password
AND user is on the login page
custom_steps: WHEN user enters the new password
custom_expected: THEN user can access the site.

title: OKTA for all users except Prospects
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a Scout
OR user is Central Office
OR user is Club Questionnaire Author
OR user is Club Questionnaire Admin
custom_expected: THEN user logs in with OKTA authentication

title: OKTA automatically provides
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is any kind of user except a Prospect
AND user is attempting to log in
custom_steps: WHEN user is not in the OKTA application
custom_expected: THEN OKTA automatically provisions the user.

title: Database authentication for Prospects
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a Prospect
AND user is logging in
custom_expected:
THEN DP system uses database to authenticate user
AND system hashes the password
AND system compares the hashed password with a hashed password in the database.
